title: The Outlaw: A Rouge Historical Romance
description:
A sweeping Western historical romance, from Nicole Jordan, the New York Times bestselling author


Lovers in the midst of a lawless Colorado range war, Jake McCord and Caitlin Kingsly boldly forsake their feuding families for a blazing, forbidden passion. But then Jake commits the ultimate betrayal â€“ is this the end to their all-consuming romance?



Rouge romance - the best historical romance novels, perfect for fans of Georgette Heyer.
author: Nicole Jordan
